## Problem 1

```{r}
pols_df = 
  read_csv("data/pols-month.csv") |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  separate(mon, into = c("year", "month","day")) |>
  mutate(
    month = case_match(
      month,
      "01" ~ "January",
      "02" ~ "February",
      "03" ~ "March",
      "04" ~ "April",
      "05" ~ "May",
      "06" ~ "June",
      "07" ~ "July",
      "08" ~ "August",
      "09" ~ "September",
      "10" ~ "October",
      "11" ~ "November",
      "12" ~ "December"
    ),
    prez_gop = replace(prez_gop,prez_gop == "1", "gop"),
    president = replace(prez_gop,prez_gop == "0", "dem")
    ) |>
  select( -prez_dem, -prez_gop, -day)

```
